description: Greater Masterwort (Astrantia major 'Ruby Cloud') is truly amazing! Its deep red-purple flowers with creamy-white ruffles make it stand out in any garden. The long flowering period of this hardy perennial means it will brighten your garden all summer long. The flowers attract pollinators too, so you're doing your bit for biodiversity as well. This beautiful flower is easy to maintain, preferring well-drained soil in partial or full shade, and only needing to be cut down annually to encourage vigorous new growth. Greater Masterwort: a stunning addition to any garden!
